biography:
Carrie-Anne Moss (born August 21, 1967) is a Canadian actress,

best known for her role of Trinity in The Matrix trilogy of films beginning with The Matrix (1999), her breakthrough film. She has starred in the films Memento and Chocolat (both 2000), Snow Cake (2006), Disturbia (2007) and Unthinkable (2010).

Description above from the Wikipedia article Carrie-Anne Moss, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Carrie-Anne Moss
